# Disposables.Add method

Adds the specified disposable.

```csharp
public void Add(IDisposable disposable)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| disposable | The disposable. |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ObjectDisposedException | Illegal to add after Dispose. |
